example_sentence_italian: Le spiagge sono piene di gente.
example_sentence_english: The beaches are full of people.

notes: partitive plural form; contraction of di + le

example_sentence_italian: La bellezza della spiaggia è sorprendente.
example_sentence_english: The beauty of the beach is surprising.
Let's go to the beach tomorrow.
We will go to the nearby beaches.
There is a scent from the nearby beaches.

example_sentence_italian: Nella spiaggia ci sono molte dune.
example_sentence_english: In the beach there are many dunes.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle spiagge del sud ci sono molte conchiglie.
example_sentence_english: In the southern beaches there are many shells.

example_sentence_italian: Sulla spiaggia ho visto un nido.
example_sentence_english: On the beach I saw a nest.
Umbrellas were set up on the beaches.

example_sentence_italian: Ho una foto con la spiaggia sullo sfondo.
example_sentence_english: I have a photo with the beach in the background.

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo foto con le spiagge alle spalle.
example_sentence_english: We have photos with the beaches behind us.
